Junior Litigation Associate – Entry-Level Role with Mentorship | Encino, CA

A well-regarded litigation firm in Encino, California is seeking a Litigation Associate with 0–2 years of experience to join its growing practice. This is an ideal opportunity for recent law school graduates or junior attorneys to gain real-world courtroom and litigation experience under the guidance of experienced trial lawyers.

________________________________________

Launch your litigation career with a leading Encino firm. Join as a junior associate and gain immediate exposure to court appearances, client contact, and mentorship in civil litigation matters across diverse industries.

________________________________________

This confidential BCG Attorney Search opportunity is with a respected Southern California litigation firm that offers junior attorneys a rare chance to gain hands-on experience early in their careers. Known for its collaborative culture and strong mentorship, the firm supports new associates in building core skills across all stages of civil litigation—from drafting motions to participating in trial preparation.

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities:

• Support senior attorneys in handling civil litigation cases from inception to resolution

• Draft pleadings, motions, discovery, and other legal documents

• Conduct legal research and prepare memoranda on complex issues

• Attend court proceedings, depositions, and client meetings with supervision

• Assist in developing litigation strategies and trial preparation

• Maintain accurate case records and document management systems

________________________________________

Qualifications:

• 0–2 years of litigation or law firm experience

• Juris Doctor (JD) from an accredited U.S. law school

• California Bar membership (active or pending)

• Excellent writing and research skills

• Eagerness to learn, take initiative, and grow within a litigation team

• Ability to work independently while contributing to a team environment

________________________________________

Culture & Firm Appeal:

The firm is known for its welcoming, supportive workplace and commitment to developing young attorneys into capable litigators. Associates benefit from direct interaction with partners, early court exposure, and a clear path for professional development. The firm values attention to detail, responsiveness, and teamwork—qualities that foster long-term success.

________________________________________

Why This Role Is Unique:

• Ideal for recent graduates or new attorneys looking to fast-track their litigation careers

• Direct mentorship from seasoned trial lawyers

• Hands-on experience with case strategy, drafting, and court appearances

• Entry point into a litigation practice with long-term growth potential

• A standout opportunity for new attorneys seeking client exposure and courtroom readiness
